api_method: Ftach Data Of Gate Pass Master
name: Ftach Data Of Gate Pass Master
script:
name = frappe.form_dict['name']

record = frappe.db.sql(" select item_code,item_name,qty,description from `tabGate Pass Item` where parent=%s  and status='Not Return'",name, as_dict=True)

frappe.response['record']=record

name: Satus Update in Gate Master
script:
parent = frappe.form_dict['parent']
item = frappe.form_dict['item_code']
status = frappe.form_dict['status']

name = frappe.db.sql(" select name from `tabGate Pass Item` where parent=%s and item_code=%s ",(parent, item))


frappe.db.set_value("Gate Pass Item", str(name[0][0]), 'status', status)

name: Gate Pass Master Status Update

api_method: truck no update in sales order
name: Truck No Update In Sales Order
script:
so_name = frappe.form_dict['so_name']
truck_no = frappe.form_dict['truck_no']
date = frappe.form_dict['date']

existing_record = frappe.get_doc("Sales Order", so_name)

new_child_row = existing_record.append("custom_truck_details_table")
new_child_row.truck_no = truck_no
new_child_row.date = date
new_child_row.status = "Not Delivered"

existing_record.save()

name: GatePASS_OUTWARDS
script:
gateID = frappe.form_dict['gateID']


record = frappe.db.sql("select company_name,vehicle_number,driver_name,driver_contact_number,tier_weight from `tabGate Pass In` where name=%s ",gateID, as_dict= True)


frappe.response['record'] = record

api_method: Work Order Get Truck No In So
name: Get Truck no In
script:
wo_name = frappe.form_dict['wo_name']

so_name = frappe.db.sql(" select sales_order from `tabWork Order` where name=%s ",wo_name)


truck_no = frappe.db.sql(" select truck_no from `tabTruck Details` where parent=%s and status='Not Delivered' ",(so_name[0][0]), as_dict=True)

frappe.response['data']=truck_no

name: Sales Invoice to Gate Pass Out Get Weight
script:
si_name = frappe.form_dict['si_name']


weight = frappe.db.sql(" select name,total_net_weight from `tabSales Invoice` where name=%s ",(si_name), as_dict=True)

frappe.response['data']=weight

name: Get Truck No In delivery Note Form So
script:
so_name = frappe.form_dict['so_name']

truck_no = frappe.db.sql(" select truck_no from `tabTruck Details` where parent=%s and status='Not Delivered' ",(so_name), as_dict=True)

frappe.response['data']=truck_no

name: gate pass in status update
script:
name = frappe.form_dict['gate_name']

frappe.db.set_value("Gate Pass In", name, 'docstatus', 3)
